data.comment: The match has started at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 1, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Tokyo.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 4, Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Tokyo in Saitama.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tokyo.
In the minute 7, Urawa's Yuki Muto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Tokyo throw-in in Urawa's half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Urawa's half?
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 13, Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Urawa, close to Tokyo's area.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Urawa to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
Urawa's Shinzo Koroki breaks free at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saitama.
In the minute 22, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
In the minute 23, Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Urawa.
Free kick Tokyo.
In the minute 27, Urawa's Koya Yuruki gets in a shot on goal at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 31, In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Urawa throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Leandro for Tokyo drives towards goal at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Tokyo close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 37, Kensuke Nagai of Tokyo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kensuke Nagai scores to make it 0-1 at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Hirotaka Mita (Tokyo) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 43, In Saitama Urawa attack through Tomoya Ugajin. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Tokyo.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Tokyo's Leandro is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Tokyo.
Shinzo Koroki (Urawa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Kenta Hasegawa is making the team's first substitution at Saitama Stadium 2002 with Takuya Uchida replacing Kyosuke Tagawa.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Urawa.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Arthur Silva for Tokyo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 54, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tokyo are pushing forward but Shuto Abe's finish is wide of the goal.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tokyo have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
In the minute 59, Urawa needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.
Tokyo are coming forward and Takuya Uchida gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Can Urawa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tokyo's half?
Can Urawa capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Tokyo to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Tokyo.
Quenten Martinus is on a sub for Kazuki Nagasawa for Urawa.
Urawa are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 68, Koichiro Fukushima signals a Tokyo throw-in in Urawa's half.
The away team replace Hirotaka Mita with Taichi Hara.
Urawa's Koya Yuruki breaks free at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Tokyo at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Tokyo's Arthur Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
In the minute 75, Shinzo Koroki (Urawa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Leonardo is replacing Koya Yuruki for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Kensuke Nagai with Yojiro Takahagi. This is the third substitution made today by Kenta Hasegawa.
Tokyo drives forward and Leandro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 78, In Saitama Urawa attack through Tomoya Ugajin. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 80, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tokyo close to the penalty box.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Tokyo.
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kenyu Sugimoto is replacing Yosuke Kashiwagi for the home team.
In the minute 85, Urawa make their fourth substitution with Ryosuke Yamanaka replacing Tomoya Ugajin.
At Saitama Stadium 2002, Tokyo are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 88, Throw-in Tokyo.
Kenta Hasegawa (Tokyo) is making a fourth substitution, with Hotaka Nakamura replacing Takumi Nakamura.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Urawa.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Saitama.
Throw-in for Urawa close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
In Saitama Urawa drive forward through Kenyu Sugimoto. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Tokyo.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
